from.S: scout.tags t inner join base.games g on t.game_id = g.game_id

select.S: t.game_id, measurement_id, measurement_time, result_ball_flight, result_batter_dexterity, result_batter_walk_or_strikeout, result_hit_result, result_outs, result_pitch_result, result_pitch_type_auto, result_pitcher_dexterity, result_runs, situation_balls, situation_batter, situation_batting_team, situation_fielding_team, situation_inning, situation_outs, situation_pitcher, situation_strikes, tag_id, getdate() as date_processed
